story-moment.THE MULTIVERSE: Doctor Strange first glimpsed Dormammu during his training, when he began to learn more about the multiverse at large.
story-moment.TIME LOOP: Face to face with Doctor Strange, Dormammu became infuriated when he was trapped in an inescapable time loop, even as he killed his enemy over and over.

powers+abilities.THE DARK DIMENSION: Dormammu has absolute control over the Dark Dimension, wielding reality around him as he sees fit, including forming lethal weapons at a thought.
powers+abilities.CONTROL OF ELEMENTS: Dormammu has power over those who serve him, such as Kaecilius and his Zealots, destroying their physical form and pulling their essence to him when he wishes.
